amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 413 which prohibits use of funds to construct, renovate, or expand any facility in the United States to house any individual detained at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, for the purposes of detention or imprisonment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike Section 413 which prohibits the use of funds to construct or expand any facility in the United States to house any individual detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, for the purposes of detention or imprisonment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 254 (Roll no. 190).
